catherine leigh schmidt / fulbright updates

friends & family,

This is a place where I publish letters about my Fulbright year in India. I figure it's easier to put them here than make you read them all in the body of an email. Please feel free to share this page with whoever you think would be interested. I'll send an email each time I update.

  • 03 Dec 2014     Hi from Mumbai

how long have I been here?

I arrived in India August 18, 2014 and the grant is finished May 18, 2015.
Aug 18
May 18
